01167     BP_REQUIRED_API_FUNCTION(notify_runtime_phase);         
01168 
01169 // ----- Phase Service API
01170 
01171     BP_REQUIRED_API_FUNCTION(phase_srv_start);

01173 
01174 // ----- TLM Common API
01175 
01176     BP_REQUIRED_API_FUNCTION(find_connector_id_by_name);    
01177     BP_REQUIRED_API_FUNCTION(get_connector_intf_name);      
01178     BP_REQUIRED_API_FUNCTION(get_connector_type);           
01179     BP_REQUIRED_API_FUNCTION(is_export_connector);          
01180     BP_REQUIRED_API_FUNCTION(external_connect);             
01181     BP_REQUIRED_API_FUNCTION(notify_end_blocking);          
01182 
01183 // ----- TLM1 put interface
01184 
01185     BP_REQUIRED_API_FUNCTION(try_put_uvm_ml_stream);        
01186     BP_REQUIRED_API_FUNCTION(can_put);                      
01187     BP_REQUIRED_API_FUNCTION(put_uvm_ml_stream);            
01188     BP_REQUIRED_API_FUNCTION(put_uvm_ml_stream_request);    
01189 
01190 // ----- TLM1 get interface
01191 
01192     BP_REQUIRED_API_FUNCTION(get_uvm_ml_stream);            
01193     BP_REQUIRED_API_FUNCTION(get_uvm_ml_stream_request);    
01194     BP_REQUIRED_API_FUNCTION(get_requested_uvm_ml_stream);  
01195     BP_REQUIRED_API_FUNCTION(try_get_uvm_ml_stream);        
01196     BP_REQUIRED_API_FUNCTION(can_get);                      
01197 
01198 // ----- TLM1 peek interface
01199 
01200     BP_REQUIRED_API_FUNCTION(peek_uvm_ml_stream);
